TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MatchCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type MatchCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示通过以迭代方式将正则表达式模式应用于输入字符串所找到的成功匹配的集合。

span.span: Represents the set of successful matches found by iteratively applying a regular expression pattern to the input string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该集合是不可变的 (只读), 没有公共构造函数。The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor. 方法返回 对象。The method returns a object. 集合包含零个或多个对象。The collection contains zero or more objects. 如果匹配成功, 则为输入字符串中找到的每个匹配项填充集合。If the match is successful, the collection is populated with one object for each match found in the input string. 如果匹配不成功, 则集合不包含任何对象, 其属性等于零。If the match is unsuccessful, the collection contains no objects, and its property equals zero. 在将正则表达式模式应用于特定输入字符串时, 正则表达式引擎使用以下两种方法之一来生成对象:When applying a regular expression pattern to a particular input string, the regular expression engine uses either of two techniques to build the object: - 直接计算。Direct evaluation. 完全填充对象, 其中的所有匹配项都是对方法的特定调用所导致的。 The object is populated all at once, with all matches resulting from a particular call to the method. 当访问集合的属性时, 将使用此方法。This technique is used when the collection's property is accessed. 它通常是填充集合的更昂贵方法, 并需要更高的性能。It typically is the more expensive method of populating the collection and entails a greater performance hit. - 迟缓计算。Lazy evaluation. 对象根据需要按匹配项进行填充。The object is populated as needed on a match-by-match basis. 它等效于调用方法的正则表达式引擎, 并向集合添加每个匹配项。It is equivalent to the regular expression engine calling the method repeatedly and adding each match to the collection. 当通过其方法访问集合时, 或`foreach`使用语句C# `For Each`(在中) 或 ... 的情况下访问该集合时, 将使用此方法。`Next`语句 (Visual Basic)。This technique is used when the collection is accessed through its method, or when it is accessed using the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each`...`Next` statement (in Visual Basic). 若要循环访问集合的成员, 应使用语言提供的集合迭代构造 (如`foreach` `For Each` C#和 .`Next`To iterate through the members of the collection, you should use the collection iteration construct provided by your language (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中), 而不是检索方法返回的枚举器。in Visual Basic) instead of retrieving the enumerator that is returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来询问一组实例。The following example illustrates the use of the class to interrogate a set of instances. [!code-cpp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CPP/words.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CS/words.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/VB/words.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int arrayIndex);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 arrayIndex) cil managed

abstract member CopyTo : Array * int -> unit override this.CopyTo : Array * int -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 要将集合复制到其中的数组。

span.span: The array the collection is to be copied into.

param.name: arrayIndex
param.span: 数组中开始复制的位置。

span.span: The position in the array where copying is to begin.

summary.span: 从给定索引处开始将集合的所有元素复制到给定数组。

span.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array starting at the given index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于集合从给定索引处开始复制到数组中, 因此目标数组的大小必须至少为整个集合。Because the collection is copied into the array starting at the given index, the destination array must be at least as large as the entire collection. > [!WARNING] > 中不存在此成员[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果要开发面向的[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]应用程序, 请改用方法。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the method instead. 由于通常使用延迟计算来填充 对象,因此尝试在它完全填充之前复制集合可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to copy the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效, 且查找单个匹配项的尝试超过该超时间隔, 则会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: is a multi-dimensional array.
is outside the bounds of .
-or-

exception.span: 以及 在 的界限外。

span.span: plus is outside the bounds of .
A time-out occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match[] array, int arrayIndex);

abstract member CopyTo : System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match[] * int -> unit override this.CopyTo : System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match[] * int -> unit
Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of matches.
The number of matches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过检索集合的 属性的值来访问对象的各个成员会导致正则表达式引擎使用直接计算填充集合。Accessing individual members of the object by retrieving the value of the collection's property causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection using direct evaluation. ln 对比度 , 调用方法 (或使用中C#的`foreach`语句和`For Each`.。。`Next` Visual Basic) 中的语句会导致正则表达式引擎使用延迟计算根据需要填充集合。ln contrast, calling the method (or using the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 直接评估与延迟计算相比, 生成集合的方法开销要大得多。Direct evaluation can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 因为通常使用延迟计算来填充 对象,所以,尝试在完全填充集合之前确定集合中的元素数目可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to determine the number of elements in the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效, 且查找单个匹配项的尝试超过该超时间隔, 则会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来确定对方法的调用是否找到了匹配项。The following example uses the property to determine whether the call to the method found any matches. 如果不是, 则表示找不到匹配项。If not, it indicates that no matches were found. 否则, 它会枚举匹配项, 并显示它们的值以及在输入字符串中找到它们的位置。Otherwise, it enumerates the matches and displays their value and the position in the input string at which they were found. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/cs/countex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/vb/countex1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式`\d+`匹配输入字符串中的一个或多个十进制字符。The regular expression pattern `\d+` matches one or more decimal characters in an input string.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: 提供一个循环访问集合的枚举器。

span.span: Provides an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

returns.span: 包含 中所有 对象的对象。

span.span: An object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应使用组C# `For Each` 迭代构造(如和...,而不是调用方法来检索枚举器,该枚举数可用于循环访问集合中的对象)。`foreach``Next`Instead of calling the method to retrieve an enumerator that lets you iterate through the objects in the collection, you should use the group iteration construct (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic) 由编程语言提供。in Visual Basic) provided by your programming language. C#使用方法 ( `For Each` 或`foreach`中的语句和 ... 中的语句) 来循环访问对象的成员。 `Next` Visual Basic) 中的语句会导致正则表达式引擎使用延迟计算根据需要填充集合。Iterating the members of the object using the method (or the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 这类似于重复调用方法, 然后将生成的匹配项添加到对象。This is analogous to repeatedly calling the method, and then adding the resulting match to the object. 与此相反, 正则表达式引擎在访问属性时使用直接计算一次填充集合。In contrast, the regular expression engine uses direct evaluation to populate the collection all at once when the property is accessed. 这种生成集合的方法比延迟计算要大得多。This can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 由于通常使用延迟计算来填充 对象,因此尝试导航到集合的下一个成员可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to the next member of the collection may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效, 且尝试查找下一个匹配项, 则会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find the next match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 中不存在此成员[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果要开发面向的[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]应用程序, 请改用属性。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the property instead.

span.span: Index into the collection.

summary.span: 获取该集合的单个成员。

span.span: Gets an individual member of the collection.

value.span: 位于集合中 位置的捕获子字符串。

span.span: The captured substring at position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在C#中, 属性是一个索引器; 它不是在代码中显式引用的, 而是允许作为数组进行访问的集合。In C#, the property is an indexer; it is not explicitly referenced in code, but instead allows the collection to be accessed as if it were an array. 通常, 只有在 从属性中确定了集合中的总项数后, 才通过索引访问对象中的单个项。Typically, individual items in the object are accessed by their index only after the total number of items in the collection has been determined from the property. 但是, 访问属性会导致正则表达式引擎使用直接计算一次生成全部集合。However, accessing the property causes the regular expression engine to use direct evaluation to build the collection all at once. 这通常比使用方法C# `foreach` 、语句或 Visual Basic `For Each`来循环访问集合更昂贵:`Next`语句。This is typically more expensive than iterating the collection using the method, the C# `foreach` statement, or the Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next` statement. 由于通常使用延迟计算来填充 对象,因此尝试定位到特定的匹配项可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to a specific match may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效, 并且查找特定匹配项的尝试超过该超时间隔, 则会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a specific match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例分析了 Nathaniel Hawthorne 的*7 个 Gables*的第一句, 并返回一个对象, 该对象包含以大写或小写 "h" 开头的所有单词。The following example parses the first sentence of Nathaniel Hawthorne's *House of the Seven Gables* and returns a object that contains all words that begin with either an uppercase or lowercase "h". 然后 , 使用属性检索每个单词, 并将其显示在控制台中。The property is then used to retrieve each word and display it to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/cs/RegEx_24804.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/vb/RegEx_24804.vb#1)] 此示例产生以下输出：The example produces the following output: ``` Half house huge ```
